00025 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_collections_make_priority_queue(dfsch_object_t* lt){
00026   pqueue_t* pq = dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_COLLECTIONS_PRIORITY_QUEUE_TYPE);
00027 
00028   pq->head = NULL;
00029   pq->lt = lt;
00030   
00031   return (dfsch_object_t*)pq;
00032 }
00033 void dfsch_collections_priority_queue_push(dfsch_object_t* q,
00034                                            dfsch_object_t* o){
00035   pqueue_t* pq;
00036   pq_entry_t* e;
00037   pq_entry_t* i;
00038   if (!DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(q, DFSCH_COLLECTIONS_PRIORITY_QUEUE_TYPE)){
00039     dfsch_error("Not a priority queue", q);
00040   }
00041   pq = (pqueue_t*)q;
00042 
00043   e = GC_NEW(pq_entry_t);
00044   e->object = o;
00045 
00046   if (!pq->head){
00047     pq->head = e;
00048   } else if (dfsch_apply(pq->lt, dfsch_list(2,
00049                                             e->object,
00050                                             pq->head->object)) != NULL){
00051     e->next = pq->head;
00052     pq->head = e;
00053   } else {
00054     i = pq->head;
00055     while (i->next){
00056       if (dfsch_apply(pq->lt, dfsch_list(2, 
00057                                          e->object,
00058                                          i->next->object))){
00059         e->next = i->next;
00060         break;
00061       }
00062     }
00063     i->next = e;
00064   }
00065 }
00066 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_collections_priority_queue_pop(dfsch_object_t* q){
00067   pqueue_t* pq;
00068   pq_entry_t* e;
00069   if (!DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(q, DFSCH_COLLECTIONS_PRIORITY_QUEUE_TYPE)){
00070     dfsch_error("Not a priority queue", q);
00071   }
00072   pq = q;
00073   if (!pq->head){
00074     dfsch_error("Priority queue is empty", q);
00075   }
00076   e = pq->head;
00077   pq->head = e->next;
00078   return e->object;
00079 }
00080 int dfsch_collections_priority_queue_empty_p(dfsch_object_t* q){
00081   if (!DFSCH_INSTANCE_P(q, DFSCH_COLLECTIONS_PRIORITY_QUEUE_TYPE)){
00082     dfsch_error("Not a priority queue", q);
00083   }
00084   return ((pqueue_t*)q)->head == NULL;
00085 }
